reference.title: Overview Mathematical Functions
reference.shortdesc: An overview of some functions for mathematics.

section.title: ROUND
section.p: This function rounds a number up or down to a specified number of decimal places.

plentry.pd: Required. The number that is to be rounded.
Required. The number of decimals to round to.

section.title: FLOOR
section.p: This function rounds a supplied number down to the nearest multiple of the specified significance.

plentry.pd: Required. The number that is to be rounded.
Required. The multiple of significance to be rounded to.

section.title: CEILING
section.p: This function rounds a number up to the nearest multiple of significance.

plentry.pd: Required. The number that is to be rounded.
Required. The multiple of significance to be rounded to.

section.title: ROUNDDOWN
section.p: This function rounds a number down to a specified number of decimal places.

plentry.pd: Required. The number that is to be rounded.
Required. The number of decimals to round to.

section.title: ROUNDUP
section.p: This function rounds a number up to a specified number of decimal places.

plentry.pd: Required. The number that is to be rounded.
Required. The number of decimals to round to.

section.title: SUMIF
section.p: This function finds values in a supplied array that satisfy given criteria and returns the sum of the corresponding values in a second supplied array.

plentry.pd: Required. An array of values to be tested against the supplied criteria. Empty cells ​​and text values ​​are ignored.
Required. The condition to be tested against each of the values in a range.

Optional. An array of numeric values which are to be added together, if the corresponding range entry satisfies the supplied criteria. If the sum_range argument is omitted, the values from the range argument are used instead.
